channel.title: First Post! on DirtGrub Minecraft PvP
channel.description: Recent content in First Post! on DirtGrub Minecraft PvP

item.title: First Post!
item.description: The first post of the official DirtGrub PvP minecraft server package main import ( "fmt" "log" "net" ) const ( website string = "www.dirtgrub.000webhostapp.com:80" ) func main() { _, err := net.Dial("udp", website) if err != nil { log.Fatal("DirtGrub is offline or just taking a nap ", err) } fmt.Print("DirtGrub is fully operational") } This is just some random I code wrote in Golang as a test to see if the website would work, The source code of this website can be found on my github here
